SEARCH
Package Views.Administrator

Class AdministratorStaffView

java.lang.Object
Views.Administrator.AdministratorStaffView
public class AdministratorStaffView extends Object
The AdministratorStaffView class provides the view layer for managing hospital staff. It handles displaying menus, receiving input, and showing feedback to administrators.

    • displayAllStaff

      public void displayAllStaff() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Displays all staff in the hospital by fetching user data from the repository.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading data.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the data format is invalid.

      Returns:
      the User object if found, otherwise null.
      Throws:

      ClassNotFoundException - if the data format is invalid.
